content.question: Which of the following is true of independent regulatory agencies?

choices.label: They tend to have larger budgets than cabinet departments.
They are directly supervised by cabinet departments.
They provide a product or service directly to the public.
They are insulated from contact with interest groups.
They tend to be freer from presidential control than are cabinet departments.

content.answer: They tend to be freer from presidential control than are cabinet departments.
